meanings.sent1: The talented frescoer carefully painted the walls of the church.
meanings.sent2: The skilled frescoer was hired to decorate the cathedral with beautiful paintings.
meanings.sent3: The friendly frescoer joked that he was turning the walls into a colorful storybook.
meanings.sent4: The imaginative frescoer transformed the plain walls into a magical world.
meanings.sent5: The dedicated frescoer brought life to the dull walls with vibrant colors.

meanings.sent1: She decided to frescoer the entire ceiling with intricate designs.
meanings.sent2: The artist planned to frescoer the walls of the art gallery next week.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally frescoered his own clothes while working on the mural.
meanings.sent4: The students were excited to frescoer their classroom walls as a school project.
meanings.sent5: The team of painters will frescoer the historic building to preserve its beauty.
